.. Hypershot documentation

Welcome to Hypershot's documentation!
=====================================

*Hypershot* creates screen shots of a video file, and uploads them to an image host.

The main documentation is in the `GitLab README <https://gitlab.com/kybernetics/hypershot#hypershot>`_
for now.
Below you'll find a link to the changelog, i.e. a timeline of the project's history.


**Contents**

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   changelog
